entry.title: $2000 // Sunset Park 2 Bedroom w/ Laundry, Microwave, Dishwasher, Cats OK!
entry.content:
(Listing ID: cl-150719.2) (718) 930-7999


To view our walk through video, please visit our website at: http://destinationrealestate.com/listing?listing=8880-cl

This is a 2 Bedroom in the Sunset Park area of Brooklyn. Building Features Laundry. The Apartment Features Microwave, Dishwasher, Granite Countertops, Hardwood Floors, Stainless Steel Appliances, Living Room, Freezer, Refrigerator, Range / Oven, and Tile Backsplash. Includes Heat, and Hot Water. Cats Accepted on Approval.

Interior Dimensions:

  • Living Room 12.5x11.5
  • Kitchen 11x7.5
  • First Bedroom 12x8
  • Second Bedroom 10x10 
Sunset Park gives you access to Greenwood, Borough Park, and Bay Ridge along with a rich cultural base and background that the neighborhood is known for. Sunset Park also features the local staple in Industry City, giving you quick access to tons of local shops inside the enormous warehouses that built Sunset Park into the neighborhood it is today. Enjoy local Parks and Greeneries such as Sunset Park and the Sunset Park Pool, Bush Terminal Piers Park, Pier 4, Rappaport Playground, Alben Triangle, Brooklyn Army Terminal, and Gonzalo Plasencia Park.Local attractions and stores include the Brooklyn Hangar, Tabla Rasa Gallery, Melody Lanes Bowling Center, Sunset Park Library, Costco, 100 Fun Karaoke Bar and the Brooklyn Nets Training Center. 20 minute train ride to parks and attractions such as the historic Alpine Cinemas, Owl's Head Park, Narrows Botanical Gardens, and Prospect Park. Nearby health centers and emergency include FDNY EMS Station 40, Maimonides Medical Center and NYU Langone Hospital - Brooklyn. Subway access to the D, N, and R trains at the 36th Street station. Commute is 40 minutes into Midtown Manhattan.

 

Where is this apartment in relation to other neighborhoods?North of Bay Ridge
South of Greenwood and Park Slope
West of Borough Park, Dyker Heights, and Bensonhurst

entry.title: $2099 // Sunny & Spacious NO FEE 2BR! Just Minutes to D/N/R!
entry.content:
Sunny & Spacious NO FEE 2BR! Just Minutes to D/N/R!

Price: $2,099
Property Type: Apartment
Bedrooms: 2.0
Bathrooms: 1.0
Floor: 4
Pets: Pets OK

Apartment Amenities

Eat In Kitchen
Hardwood
High Ceilings
Light
NO FEE
Original Details
Renovated
Stainless Steel Appliances

This gorgeous NO FEE unit has been fully renovated including stunning hardwood floors, modern amenities and a sparkling kitchen and bathroom! There is a very spacious living area with great natural light plus a large kitchen, equipped with custom cabinets and full-size stainless steel appliances. There is one king-sized bedroom and another slightly smaller. Come check it out, this one will go quickly!

Located on the fourth floor of a well-maintained pre-war building in beautiful Greenwood! The building is on a quiet, tree-lined block just seconds from Greenwood Cemetery. Just down the street you'll find a great variety of restaurants, entertainment, shopping, COSTCO. Industry City is also just a short trip!! The N/D/R trains are just a few minutes away as well and it's only a half hour trip into midtown Manhattan!

Heat/hot water included. Pets OK!

Like to set up a showing? Have questions? Please call, text or e-mail me! I have other available units in the building as well. Lena Richardson
